Message:
The idea of going back to
my old house still scares me...

but Dad was once
my lord’s gardener.
Dad might’ve left something
behind here at the mansion.

With that idea in mind,
I searched his old room,
and found a notebook.

“The snacks I had during
break time were so delicious.”

“The rain makes the flowers
look like they’re dancing.”

This is Dad’s handwriting...
There was even a drawing
of dancing flowers.

As I continued reading,
missing Dad more and more,
I came across one particular
sentence.

“Thanks to a certain flower,
I’ve become good friends with
the woman from the flower shop.”
